showerReviews.reviewText: … for gas after getting off the 80. Very clean place! Cashier was nice! Looks cleaner than most of the other travel places where you can take a shower. They have a wide selection of snacks and drinks. The place is pretty big. Good experience!

Stopped for fuel, and a shower. Fuel islands and parking lot are clean and in good condition. Store is nice, shower was CLEAN. The ONLY  reason for 4 stars not 5 is, not open 24 hrs. Otherwise this is what a truck stop should be.

Great place to refule the car, grab something to eat, and stretch your legs.  They have clean bathrooms and a shower room for the truck drivers.  This store gives you a decent choice of souvenirs or quick gifts.
